# f5xc_crl (Resource)

API to create CRL object

~> **Note** For more information about this resource, please refer to the [F5 XC API Documentation](https://docs.cloud.f5.com/docs/api/).

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "f5xc_crl" "example" {
  name      = "example"
  namespace = "system"

  labels = {
    "env" = "production"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the CRL. Must be unique within the namespace.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the CRL will be created.

### Optional

- `annotations` (Map of String) Annotations to apply to this resource.
- `http_access` (Block, Optional) HTTPAccessInfo. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--http_access))
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels to apply to this resource.
- `refresh_interval` (Number) CRL Refresh interval. CRL refresh interval, in hours. ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.gte: 6 ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.lte: 168
- `server_address` (String) CRL Server address. CRL server address or hostname Required: YES ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true ves.io.schema.rules.string.hostname_or_ip: true ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 255
- `server_port` (Number) CRL Server Port. Set CRL Server port number ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.gte: 1 ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.lte: 65535
- `timeout` (Number) CRL download timeout. CRL download wait time, in seconds ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.gte: 1 ves.io.schema.rules.uint32.lte: 180

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the resource.

<a id="nestedblock--http_access"></a>
### Nested Schema for `http_access`

Optional:

- `path` (String) CRL File path. CRL file location ves.io.schema.rules.string.http_path: true ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 256

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# Import using namespace/name format
terraform import f5xc_crl.example system/example
```
